subject: RE: [junit] ? access current test method name, in setUp() and tearDown()
msgSnippet: I received 2 answers : toString(), and getName() To summarize : call          |      result ... this.toString() | test_Method_1(com.mycomp.MyTestCase)
messageBody:
I received 2 answers : toString(), and getName()
To summarize :

call | result
-----------------------------------------------------------
this.toString() | test_Method_1(com.mycomp.MyTestCase)
this.getName () | test_Method_1





getName() is what I was looking for.



-----Message d'origine-----
I wonder if there is a way to obtain the name of the current test method,
when you are in setUp() or tearDown()?
